page.title: 01Bayford-L'Berkhamsted Area
page.content: In our area there are two villages, {Bayford and Little Berkhamsted.}Both are relatively small. The nearest large towns for shopping and employ- ment are Hertford, Hatfield, Welwyn Garden City. There are very{few amenities.}There are three bus services, but only one runs daily.There is also Bayford Rail- way Station, on a main line into London. Private transport is essential. This is primarily a{farming area, with eight farms. There is also much {woodland,}the amount is usual for such a low-lying area in the South-East. There are ten woods. There are also some good{footpaths}in this hilly area. Of particular interest to{visitors are 2 Parish Churches and the Folly.
